title: Loot Table Entry
description: Defines an entry in a loot table pool that can be selected when the pool rolls.

fields.title: Type
fields.description: The type of entry. Valid values: 'item' (drops an item), 'loot_table' (references another loot table), 'empty' (drops nothing).

fields.title: Name
fields.description: The item identifier (for type 'item') or loot table path (for type 'loot_table').

fields.title: Weight
fields.description: The relative weight of this entry being selected. Higher weights are more likely. Default is 1.

fields.title: Functions
fields.description: Array of functions to apply to the item when selected.

fields.title: Conditions
fields.description: Array of conditions that must be met for this entry to be considered.

fields.title: Pools
fields.description: Nested pools for type 'loot_table'. Allows inline loot table definition.
